entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then steady. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
